title: Pumping Up A Star: The Leaky Suit That Blew Up A Career
teaser: From the My Big Break archives: Designer June Ambrose talks about how her big break came when hip-hop artist Missy Elliott needed a signature look for her first big video, "The Rain."
contentencoded:
From the My Big Break archives: Designer June Ambrose talks about how her big break came when hip-hop artist Missy Elliott needed a signature look for her first big video, "The Rain." This story originally aired on All Things Considered on March 16, 2014.
